name: Malicious Sorcery
description: Increases attack speed while wielding a scepter. Reduces recharge on scepter skills.

name: Medic's Feedback
description: Cast Feedback while reviving an ally. Feedback revives allies inside its dome.

name: Mender's Purity
description: Cast Lesser Power Cleanse when you use a healing skill.

name: Transfusion
description: Shroud skill 4 heals and partially revives nearby allies. Up to five nearby downed allies are teleported to you upon using shroud skill 4.

name: Ritual of Life
description: Cast Lesser Well of Blood when reviving an ally. Wells of Blood revive allies every pulse.

name: Blood Bank
description: Gaining health grants a proportionate amount of barrier. Conversion amount increases while at full health.
facts: Full Health Healing Conversion Rate|Percent|https://render.guildwars2.com/file/9352ED3244417304995F26CB01AE76BB7E547052/156661.png|100|Healing Conversion Rate|Percent|https://render.guildwars2.com/file/9352ED3244417304995F26CB01AE76BB7E547052/156661.png|10|Healing Conversion Rate|Percent|https://render.guildwars2.com/file/9352ED3244417304995F26CB01AE76BB7E547052/156661.png|5|Combat Only|NoData|https://render.guildwars2.com/file/9352ED3244417304995F26CB01AE76BB7E547052/156661.png

name: Vampiric
description: Siphon health whenever you hit a foe. Minions siphon health and transfer it to you.

name: Overflowing Thirst
description: Gain life force when you strike a foe with a dagger.

name: Life from Death
description: Heal allies in an area when you exit shroud. Increase healing to other allies.

name: Mark of Evasion
description: Leave a Mark of Blood when you dodge.

name: Banshee's Wail
description: Warhorn skills gain increased effect duration.

name: Lingering Curse
description: Your condition damage is increased. Conditions inflicted by scepter skills have longer durations, and Feast of Corruption becomes Devouring Darkness.

name: Barbed Precision
description: Critical hits have a chance to cause bleeding. Increases bleed duration.

name: Furious Demise
description: Gain fury when entering shroud. Gain additional precision.

name: Target the Weak
description: Increases critical-hit chance for each condition on the foe. Gain condition damage based on your precision.

name: Terror
description: Fear you inflict deals damage each second.

name: Weakening Shroud
description: Cast Lesser Enfeeble when entering shroud. Critical hits inflict weakness.

name: Flesh of the Master
description:
Minions have increased health. Gain carapace for each minion you control.
Your minions are destroyed when this trait is reassigned.

name: Awaken the Pain
description: Might grants you more power and less condition damage. Gain might when entering shroud.

name: Soul Comprehension
description: Your passive life-force generation from nearby deaths is increased. Kills grant <c=@abilitytype>carapace</c>.

name: Death Nova
description: When you or one of your minions is downed, create a Poison Nova. Summon a jagged horror when you kill a foe.

description: Deal increased strike damage to enemies below the health threshold.

name: Deadly Strength
description: <c=@abilitytype>Carapace</c> stacks grant power.

name: Armored Shroud
description: Gain <c=@abilitytype>carapace</c> when entering shroud.

name: Putrid Defense

name: Necromantic Corruption
description:
Minions deal more damage and take conditions from you. When a minion attacks, it transfers conditions to its target.
There is a 10 second cooldown per minion.

name: Dark Defiance
description:
If you are disabled, gain protection. Incoming condition damage is reduced while you have protection.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, fear, taunt, and launch.

name: Soul Barbs
description: Entering or exiting shroud increases all damage you deal for a duration.

name: Soul Marks
description: Marks become unblockable and generate life force when triggered.

name: Chill of Death
description: Cast Lesser Spinal Shivers on a foe when attacking them while their health is below the threshold.

name: Spiteful Spirit
description: Strike around you when entering shroud.

description: Your tool belt skills gain reduced recharge. Tool belt skills remove conditions. <c=@reminder> Engage Photon Forge cannot activate this trait</c>

name: Celestial Being
description: Gain access to <c=@abilitytype>Glyphs</c>. Become a celestial avatar once you gain enough astral force. Generate astral force by healing allies and damaging foes.

name: Blood Bond
description: Cast Lesser Signet of Vampirism when you inflict bleeding on a foe that already has at least three stacks of bleeding.

name: Impact Savant
description: A percentage of the strike damage you deal is converted into barrier.

name: Chemical Rounds
description: Gain condition damage. Your pistol skills gain increased condition duration.

name: Mantle of Sand
description:
Gain the power to craft sand shadows and command them using your life force. Gain access to Punishment and Shade skills.
Shade skills inherit the effects of traits that affect shroud skills.

name: Sword Proficiency
description: You can wield swords in your main hand.

name: Mirage Cloak
description: Gain Mirage Cloak instead of dodge rolling. <c=@abilitytype>Ambush</c> skills become available for a short time whenever you gain Mirage Cloak. Gain access to <c=@abilitytype>Deception</c> skills.

name: Elevated Bond
description:
Gain access to Stances. Survival in the desert has enhanced your connection to your pet, granting you the ability to meld with them by entering beastmode.
Traits that affect your pet may affect you differently while in beastmode.

name: Crystal Configuration: Eclipse
description: Corona Burst grants a barrier for each target struck.

While out of combat, you will automatically stock a blade every 10 seconds.

name: Panaku's Ambition
description:
Gain barrier when you strike foes with a stealth attack. When you apply stealth to allies, you also grant them barrier.
This effect can only be received once and will reset when stealth is removed.

name: Mech Core: Barrier Engine
description:
Unlocks the Mech Command skill Barrier Burst. While in combat, your mech will automatically grant a small barrier each interval to nearby allies.

The mech does not count against the target count for this trait.

name: Mech Arms: Single-Edge Cutters
description: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Rolling Smash. Your mech's attacks apply bleeding. This effect may only affect a given target once per interval.

description: When you or your pet unleash, gain protection and convert a percentage of strike damage into healing for a short duration.

name: Second Opinion
description: A portion of condition damage is converted to healing power. Gain condition damage, which is increased when wielding a scepter.

name: Traversing Dusk
description: Heal allies in the area around you when you shadowstep. Gain shadow force for each ally in the radius. Wells grant resistance on their initial impact.

name: Cleansing Unleash
description: Remove conditions when you or your pet unleash.

name: Amplified Siphoning
description: Gain increased shadow force when hitting a foe with <c=@abilitytype>Siphon</c>. Grant increased barrier when targeting an ally.

name: Shadestep
description: The beneficial effects of your Shadow Shroud skills now affect allies in an area around your tethered ally. Grant additional boons to yourself and affected allies when you use a shadow shroud skill.

name: Larcenous Torment
description:
Steal health and gain shadow force when you torment a foe.
Does not grant shadow force while in shroud.

name: Mechanical Genius
description:
Through your mechanical genius, you have utilized Canthan jade technology to build a customized battle mech that will fight at your side.
Your mech inherits a percentage of all of your combat attributes except precision, which is added to its own.
Your tool belt skills are replaced with Mech Commands, customized by your trait choices. Mech Commands take longer to recharge when using them far away from your mech.
Gain access to signet utility skills.

name: Mech Core: Jade Dynamo
description: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Jade Mortar. Mech Command skills grant you quickness when used and have a reduced cooldown.

name: Mech Frame: Variable Mass Distributor
description: Unlocks the Mech Command skill Core Reactor Shot. Your mech gains a greater percentage of your own precision stats.

name: Scepter Proficiency
description: You can wield scepters.

name: Mech Arms: High-Impact Drivers
description:
Unlocks the Mech Command skill Explosive Knuckle. Your mech's attacks now generate might for allies within a radius. This effect may only occur once per interval.

The mech does not count against the target count for this trait.

name: Debilitating Blows
description:
Disabling a foe applies conditions to that foe based on your current state.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

name: Mech Core: J-Drive
description:
Gain access to the Mech Command skill Sky Circus. While dismissed or away for repairs, your mech supports you with an occasional aerial bombardment.
Signet skills gain improved passive effects and continue to grant their passive bonuses while recharging.

name: Shallow Grave
description: Transfer conditions to an enemy when targeting them with Siphon. Remove conditions from you and your ally when targeting them with Siphon.

name: Hungering Darkness
description: While in shroud, transfer conditions from your tethered ally and cleanse conditions from yourself. Each condition removed in this fashion heals a percentage of your base health and grants your tethered ally barrier.

name: Blinding Outburst
description: Venomous Outburst deals more damage and applies blindness in addition to its other effects. <c=@abilitytype>Unleashed Ambush</c> skills deal more damage.

description: Gain increased strike damage for each round of ammunition spent.

name: Lush Forest
description:
Using the first round of ammo on an ammunition skill reduces the recharge of all warrior skills.
Does not affect the recharge of Unsheathe Gunsaber, Sheathe Gunsaber, and Dragon Trigger.

name: Eternal Champion
description: Gain stability and endurance when entering berserk mode. Traits that trigger when entering berserk mode also trigger when exiting berserk mode. You can now exit berserk mode early.
